data.name: Heavy Hearts
data.detailed_description:
Humans are near extinct. Only a few remain, living in isolation. Those that are found are used for slave labor, pleasure, or worse. Orcs, Lycans, Drakes, and other various creatures would love to get their hands on one. Luccia will find out what happened, stop the extinction, and repopulate the human race (some mixing may occur!)
Breaking away from the overcrowded Adult Visual Novel style game, Heavy Hearts is an action game with lewd content.



A QUALITY RPG WITH LEWD THEMES:
- Exploration, looting, and trading: Scavenge various materials across the land and craft/trade for other survival / lewd items
- Sneak around, avoiding detection from sentient races looking to cash in on rare breeds of humans. The worst thing that can happen is they turn you in... right?
- ATB Fights! Normal attacks build the ATB gauge (called NRG). Each filled gauge adds a Combat Orb to your Hud, which can be used for abilities. With each orb, you can charge Magic a level, and blast enemies away.

A WORLD WHERE HUMANS ARE ENDANGERED:
- Meet fantastical races across the land
- Make lasting relationships, fall in and out of love, and attempt to repopulate the human race.
- Conversate with your diverse teammates, and build friendships into something more.



Heavy Hearts is an ATB/Turn Based Battler featuring art from Cheka, among other artists featured on Itch.

data.short_description: Adults only! If humans are near extinction, how do you repopulate? The answer to the question is simple, lots of breeding! The real problem starts when you begin to catch feelings..... Heavy Hearts is full of romance and NSFW goodness. Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700HQ CPU @ 2.8GHz
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8192 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700HQ CPU @ 2.8GHz
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 16 Series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16384 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

content_descriptors.notes: Features expicit sexual acts between the protagonist and various other characters throughout the story of varying races. Orcs and Werewolves included.
